  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fest.assertions.core.Assert<LinearLayoutAssert,android.widget.LinearLayout>, org.fest.assertions.core.Descriptable<LinearLayoutAssert>, org.fest.assertions.core.ExtensionPoints<LinearLayoutAssert,android.widget.LinearLayout>

    public final class LinearLayoutAssert
extends AbstractLinearLayoutAssert<LinearLayoutAssert,android.widget.LinearLayout>
    Assertions for LinearLayout instances.

    This class is final. To extend use AbstractLinearLayoutAssert.
